text: Mar 25, if you love the sea this is the place to learn to boat sailing, nice restaurant and a small chalet looking out the sea.
Hidden jems. Wheelchair friendly too. Friendly staff. Lots of race events. Good Seaview chalet. Professional instructors. Good restaurant and bars.

Wonderful ambience. The view from the restaurant is amazing and it is next to the beach. Multiple food options, especially sea food. Loved the honey lemon chicken and fresh coconut water. Chicken curry with rice was the usual. Sea food fried rice was quite nice also.

Itâ€™s a very unique corner of Singapore.
You can have outdoor adventures with your kids or just sip a beer by the pool, your choice.
I enjoy hanging out there almost every weekend
